1.title: Villainy Has a New Name
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Rumble in the Jungle
2.plot: Shadowbot is up to his old tricks again! This time, he's sent his henchmen Nyxx and Smashbot to a jungle planet in order to mine for precious energy crystals. But no worries -- the Space Heroes are on the case! Ace, Kira, Gizmo and Professor Q, along with new heroes Zed and Krill, are on their way to put an end to Shadowbot's evil plans. Will they succeed?

imdb.plot outline: Arriving at a distant galaxy, Shadowbot orders his minions to sap the light from a star. The defenseless aliens of the star system send a distress call across space. Fortunately, it's heard by the Space Heroes -- Ace, Kira and Professor Q! Can our intrepid heroes make it in time? Will they stop Shadowbot's minions from draining the star? Will Shadowbot make villain of the year?
